stench.name: Stench
stench.description: By releasing a stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.

drizzle.name: Drizzle
drizzle.description: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

speedBoost.name: Speed Boost
speedBoost.description: The Pokémon’s Speed stat is boosted every turn.

battleArmor.name: Battle Armor
battleArmor.description: Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.description: The Pokémon cannot be knocked out by a single hit as long as its HP is full. One-hit KO moves will also fail to knock it out.

damp.name: Damp
damp.description: The Pokémon dampens its surroundings, preventing all Pokémon from using explosive moves such as Self-Destruct.

limber.name: Limber
limber.description: The Pokémon’s limber body prevents it from being paralyzed.

sandVeil.name: Sand Veil
sandVeil.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasiveness in a sandstorm by 20%. Pokémon with this ability also receive no damage from sandstorm.

static.name: Static
static.description: Contact with the Pokémon has a 30% chance to paralyze the attacker.

voltAbsorb.name: Volt Absorb
voltAbsorb.description: If hit by an Electric-type move, the Pokémon has 1/4 of its maximum HP restored instead of taking damage.

waterAbsorb.name: Water Absorb
waterAbsorb.description: If hit by a Water-type move, the Pokémon has 1/4 of its maximum HP restored instead of taking damage.

oblivious.name: Oblivious
oblivious.description: The Pokémon is oblivious, keeping it from being infatuated, falling for taunts, or being affected by Intimidate.

compoundEyes.name: Compound Eyes
compoundEyes.description: The Pokémon’s compound eyes boost its accuracy by 30%.

insomnia.name: Insomnia
insomnia.description: The Pokémon’s insomnia prevents it from falling asleep.

colorChange.name: Color Change
colorChange.description: The Pokémon’s type becomes the type of the move used on it.

immunity.name: Immunity
immunity.description: The Pokémon’s immune system prevents it from being poisoned.

flashFire.name: Flash Fire
flashFire.description: If hit by a Fire-type move, the Pokémon absorbs the flames and uses them to power up its own Fire-type moves by 50%.

shieldDust.name: Shield Dust
shieldDust.description: Protective dust shields the Pokémon from the additional effects of moves.

ownTempo.name: Own Tempo
ownTempo.description: The Pokémon sticks to its own tempo, preventing it from becoming confused or being affected by Intimidate.

suctionCups.name: Suction Cups
suctionCups.description: The Pokémon uses suction cups to stay in one spot. This protects it from moves and items that would force it to switch out.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it intimidates opposing Pokémon and makes them cower, lowering their Attack stats.

shadowTag.name: Shadow Tag
shadowTag.description: The Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon’s shadows to prevent them from fleeing or switching out.

roughSkin.name: Rough Skin
roughSkin.description: The Pokémon’s rough skin damages attackers that make direct contact with it by 1/16 of their maximum HP.

wonderGuard.name: Wonder Guard
wonderGuard.description: Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves hit the Pokémon.

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.description: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

effectSpore.name: Effect Spore
effectSpore.description: Contact with the Pokémon has a 30% chance to inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on the attacker.

synchronize.name: Synchronize
synchronize.description: Passes its status condition to the Pokémon that inflicted it. If this Pokémon is your lead into battle, opposing wild Pokémon will share its nature.

clearBody.name: Clear Body
clearBody.description: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

naturalCure.name: Natural Cure
naturalCure.description: The Pokémon’s status conditions are cured when it switches out.

lightningRod.name: Lightning Rod
lightningRod.description: The Pokémon draws in all Electric-type moves. Instead of taking damage from them, its Sp. Atk stat is boosted.

sereneGrace.name: Serene Grace
sereneGrace.description: Doubles the likelihood of additional effects occurring when the Pokémon uses its moves. This does not affect items.

swiftSwim.name: Swift Swim
swiftSwim.description: Doubles the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.

chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.description: Doubles the Pokémon’s Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

illuminate.name: Illuminate
illuminate.description: By illuminating its surroundings, the Pokémon raises the likelihood of double battles and prevents its accuracy from being lowered.

trace.name: Trace
trace.description: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon copies an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.

poisonPoint.name: Poison Point
poisonPoint.description: Contact with the Pokémon has a 30% chance to poison the attacker.

innerFocus.name: Inner Focus
innerFocus.description: The Pokémon’s intense focus prevents it from flinching or being affected by Intimidate.

magmaArmor.name: Magma Armor
magmaArmor.description: The Pokémon’s hot magma coating prevents it from being frozen.

waterVeil.name: Water Veil
waterVeil.description: The Pokémon’s water veil prevents it from being burned.

magnetPull.name: Magnet Pull
magnetPull.description: Prevents Steel-type Pokémon from fleeing by pulling them in with magnetism.

soundproof.name: Soundproof
soundproof.description: Soundproofing gives the Pokémon full immunity to all sound-based moves.

rainDish.name: Rain Dish
rainDish.description: The Pokémon gradually regains 1/16 of its maximum HP in rain.

sandStream.name: Sand Stream
sandStream.description: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.

pressure.name: Pressure
pressure.description: Puts other Pokémon under pressure, causing them to expend more PP to use their moves.

thickFat.name: Thick Fat
thickFat.description: The Pokémon is protected by a layer of thick fat, which halves the damage taken from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

earlyBird.name: Early Bird
earlyBird.description: The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.

flameBody.name: Flame Body
flameBody.description: Contact with the Pokémon has a 30% chance to burn the attacker.

runAway.name: Run Away
runAway.description: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.

keenEye.name: Keen Eye
keenEye.description: The Pokémon’s keen eyes prevent its accuracy from being lowered. It also ignores the target’s stages in evasion.

hyperCutter.name: Hyper Cutter
hyperCutter.description: The Pokémon’s prized, mighty pincers prevent other Pokémon from lowering its Attack stat.

pickup.name: Pickup
pickup.description: The Pokémon may pick up the item an opposing Pokémon held during a battle.

truant.name: Truant
truant.description: Each time the Pokémon uses a move, it spends the next turn loafing around.

hustle.name: Hustle
hustle.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat by 50%, but lowers the accuracy of physical moves by 20%.

cuteCharm.name: Cute Charm
cuteCharm.description: The Pokémon has a 30% chance to infatuate attackers that make direct contact with it..

plus.name: Plus
plus.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon by 50% if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

minus.name: Minus
minus.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokémon by 50% if an ally with the Plus or Minus Ability is also in battle.

forecast.name: Forecast
forecast.description: The Pokémon transforms with the weather to change its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.

stickyHold.name: Sticky Hold
stickyHold.description: The Pokémon’s held items cling to its sticky body and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.

shedSkin.name: Shed Skin
shedSkin.description: The Pokémon has a 1/3 chance to cure its own status conditions by shedding its skin.

guts.name: Guts
guts.description: It’s so gutsy that having a status condition boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat by 50%.

marvelScale.name: Marvel Scale
marvelScale.description: The Pokémon’s marvelous scales boost its Defense stat by 50% if it has a status condition.

liquidOoze.name: Liquid Ooze
liquidOoze.description: The strong stench of the Pokémon’s oozed liquid damages attackers that use HP-draining moves

overgrow.name: Overgrow
overgrow.description: Powers up Grass-type moves by 50% when the Pokémon is at less than or equal to 1/3 of its maximum HP.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.description: Powers up Fire-type moves by 50% when the Pokémon is at less than or equal to 1/3 of its maximum HP.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.description: Powers up Water-type moves by 50% when the Pokémon is at less than or equal to 1/3 of its maximum HP.

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.description: Powers up Bug-type moves by 50% when the Pokémon is at less than or equal to 1/3 of its maximum HP.

rockHead.name: Rock Head
rockHead.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

drought.name: Drought
drought.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

arenaTrap.name: Arena Trap
arenaTrap.description: Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing. The Pokémon also raises the likelihood of double battles.

vitalSpirit.name: Vital Spirit
vitalSpirit.description: The Pokémon is full of vitality, and that prevents it from falling asleep.

whiteSmoke.name: White Smoke
whiteSmoke.description: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

purePower.name: Pure Power
purePower.description: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.

shellArmor.name: Shell Armor
shellArmor.description: A hard shell protects the Pokémon from critical hits.

tangledFeet.name: Tangled Feet
tangledFeet.description: Moves targetting the Pokémon have their accuracy halved when the Pokémon is confused.

motorDrive.name: Motor Drive
motorDrive.description: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Electric-type moves. Instead, its Speed stat is boosted.

rivalry.name: Rivalry
rivalry.description: The Pokémon’s competitive spirit makes it deal 25% more damage to Pokémon of the same gender, but 25% less damage to Pokémon of the opposite gender.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.description: The Pokémon’s determination boosts its Speed stat every time it flinches.

snowCloak.name: Snow Cloak
snowCloak.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s evasiveness in snow or hail by 20%. Pokémon with this ability also receive no damage from hail.

gluttony.name: Gluttony
gluttony.description: If the Pokémon is holding a Berry to be eaten when its HP is low, it will instead eat the Berry when its HP drops to half or less.

angerPoint.name: Anger Point
angerPoint.description: The Pokémon is angered when it takes a critical hit, and that maxes its Attack stat.

unburden.name: Unburden
unburden.description: Doubles the Speed stat of the Pokémon’ if its held item is used or lost.

heatproof.name: Heatproof
heatproof.description: The Pokémon’s heatproof body halves the damage taken from Fire-type moves.

simple.name: Simple
simple.description: Doubles the effects of the Pokémon’s stat changes.

drySkin.name: Dry Skin
drySkin.description: Restores the Pokémon’s HP in rain by 1/8 of its maximum HP or 1/4 when it is hit by Water-type moves. Reduces its maximum HP by 1/8 in harsh sunlight, and receives 25% more damage from Fire-type moves.

download.name: Download
download.description: The Pokémon compares an opposing Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or Sp. Atk stat — whichever will be more effective.

poisonHeal.name: Poison Heal
poisonHeal.description: If poisoned, the Pokémon has 1/8 of its maximum HP restored instead of taking damage

adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.description: Increases the boost moves of the same type as the Pokémon get from 1.5x to 2x. Moves affected by the Stellar-type Tera are not boosted further.

skillLink.name: Skill Link
skillLink.description: Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.

hydration.name: Hydration
hydration.description: Cures the Pokémon’s status conditions in rain.

solarPower.name: Solar Power
solarPower.description: In harsh sunlight, the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat is boosted by 50%, but loses 1/8 of its maximum HP every turn.

quickFeet.name: Quick Feet
quickFeet.description: Boosts the Speed stat by 50% if the Pokémon has a status condition.

normalize.name: Normalize
normalize.description: All the Pokémon’s moves become Normal type. The power of those moves is boosted by 30%.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.description: If the Pokémon’s attack lands a critical hit, the attack is powered up by an additional 1.5x, making for 2.25x the normal damage.

magicGuard.name: Magic Guard
magicGuard.description: The Pokémon only takes damage from direct attacks.

noGuard.name: No Guard
noGuard.description: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land. The Pokémon also raises the likelihood of double battles.

stall.name: Stall
stall.description: The Pokémon is always the last to use its moves.

technician.name: Technician
technician.description: Powers up moves which have an effective power of 60 or less by 50%. Moves with variable power must be 60 or less to be boosted.

leafGuard.name: Leaf Guard
leafGuard.description: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.description: The Pokémon can’t use any held items.

moldBreaker.name: Mold Breaker
moldBreaker.description: The Pokémon’s moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

superLuck.name: Super Luck
superLuck.description: The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted by one stage.

aftermath.name: Aftermath
aftermath.description: Damages the attacker if it knocks out the Pokémon with a move that makes direct contact by 1/4 of the attacker’s maximum HP.

anticipation.name: Anticipation
anticipation.description: The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon’s dangerous moves.

forewarn.name: Forewarn
forewarn.description: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can tell one of the moves an opposing Pokémon has.

unaware.name: Unaware
unaware.description: The Pokémon ignores the opposing Pokémon’s stat changes.

tintedLens.name: Tinted Lens
tintedLens.description: The Pokémon can use "not very effective" moves to deal regular damage.

filter.name: Filter
filter.description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken by 25%.

slowStart.name: Slow Start
slowStart.description: For five turns, the Pokémon’s Attack and Speed stats are halved.

scrappy.name: Scrappy
scrappy.description: The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal- and Fighting-type moves. It is also unaffected by Intimidate.

stormDrain.name: Storm Drain
stormDrain.description: The Pokémon draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of taking damage from them, its Sp. Atk stat is boosted.

iceBody.name: Ice Body
iceBody.description: The Pokémon gradually regains 1/16 of their maximum HP in snow or hail. Pokémon with this ability also receive no damage from hail.

solidRock.name: Solid Rock
solidRock.description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken by 25%.

snowWarning.name: Snow Warning
snowWarning.description: The Pokémon makes it snow when it enters a battle.

honeyGather.name: Honey Gather
honeyGather.description: The Pokémon gathers Honey after a battle is won. The Honey is then sold for money.

frisk.name: Frisk
frisk.description: When it enters a battle, the Pokémon can check an opposing Pokémon’s Ability.

reckless.name: Reckless
reckless.description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage by 20%. Does not include Struggle.

multitype.name: Multitype
multitype.description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the Plate it holds.

flowerGift.name: Flower Gift
flowerGift.description: Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself and allies by 50% in harsh sunlight.

badDreams.name: Bad Dreams
badDreams.description: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon by 1/8 of their maximum HP.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.description: The Pokémon steals the held item from attackers that make direct contact with it.

sheerForce.name: Sheer Force
sheerForce.description: Removes any additional effects from the Pokémon’s moves, but increases the moves’ power by 30%.

contrary.name: Contrary
contrary.description: Reverses any stat changes affecting the Pokémon so that attempts to boost its stats instead lower them — and attempts to lower its stats will boost them.

unnerve.name: Unnerve
unnerve.description: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.

defiant.name: Defiant
defiant.description: If the Pokémon has any stat lowered by an opposing Pokémon, its Attack stat will be boosted sharply.

defeatist.name: Defeatist
defeatist.description: Halves the Pokémon’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP drops to half or less.

cursedBody.name: Cursed Body
cursedBody.description: Has a 30% chance to disable a move that has dealt damage to the Pokémon.

healer.name: Healer
healer.description: Has a 30% chance to cure the status conditions of the Pokémon’s allies.

friendGuard.name: Friend Guard
friendGuard.description: Reduces damage done to allies by 25%.

weakArmor.name: Weak Armor
weakArmor.description: The Pokémon’s Defense stat is lowered when it takes damage from physical moves, but its Speed stat is sharply boosted.

multiscale.name: Multiscale
multiscale.description: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes by half while its HP is full.

toxicBoost.name: Toxic Boost
toxicBoost.description: Powers up physical moves by 50% when the Pokémon is poisoned.

flareBoost.name: Flare Boost
flareBoost.description: Powers up special moves by 50% when the Pokémon is burned.

harvest.name: Harvest
harvest.description: May create another Berry after one is used.

telepathy.name: Telepathy
telepathy.description: The Pokémon anticipates and dodges the attacks of its allies.

moody.name: Moody
moody.description: Every turn, one of the Pokémon’s stats will be boosted sharply, but another stat will be lowered.

overcoat.name: Overcoat
overcoat.description: The Pokémon takes no damage from sandstorms or hail. It is also protected from the effects of powders and spores.

poisonTouch.name: Poison Touch
poisonTouch.description: Has a 30% chance to poison a target when the Pokémon makes contact.

regenerator.name: Regenerator
regenerator.description: The Pokémon has 33% of its maximum HP restored when withdrawn from battle.

bigPecks.name: Big Pecks
bigPecks.description: Prevents the Pokémon from having its Defense stat lowered.

sandRush.name: Sand Rush
sandRush.description: Doubles the Pokémon’s Speed stat in a sandstorm. Pokémon with this ability also receive no damage from sandstorm.

wonderSkin.name: Wonder Skin
wonderSkin.description: Lowers the accuracy of status moves used against the Pokémon to 50%.

analytic.name: Analytic
analytic.description: Boosts the power of the Pokémon’s move by 30% if it is the last to act that turn.

illusion.name: Illusion
illusion.description: The Pokémon fools opponents by entering battle disguised as the last Pokémon in its Trainer’s party.

imposter.name: Imposter
imposter.description: The Pokémon transforms itself into the Pokémon it’s facing.

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.description: The Pokémon’s moves are unaffected by the target’s barriers, substitutes, and the like.

mummy.name: Mummy
mummy.description: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Mummy.

moxie.name: Moxie
moxie.description: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it shows moxie, which boosts its Attack stat.

justified.name: Justified
justified.description: When the Pokémon is hit by a Dark-type attack, its Attack stat is boosted by its sense of justice.

rattled.name: Rattled
rattled.description: The Pokémon gets scared when hit by a Dark-, Ghost-, or Bug-type attack or if intimidated, which boosts its Speed stat.

magicBounce.name: Magic Bounce
magicBounce.description: The Pokémon reflects status moves instead of getting hit by them.

sapSipper.name: Sap Sipper
sapSipper.description: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Grass-type moves. Instead, its Attack stat is boosted.

prankster.name: Prankster
prankster.description: Gives priority to the Pokémon’s status moves. Dark-type Pokémon are immune to these moves.

sandForce.name: Sand Force
sandForce.description: Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm by 30%. Pokémon with this ability also receive no damage from sandstorm.

ironBarbs.name: Iron Barbs
ironBarbs.description: The Pokémon’s iron barbs damage the attacker if it makes direct contact for 1/8 of the attacker’s maximum HP.

zenMode.name: Zen Mode
zenMode.description: Changes the Pokémon’s shape when HP is half or less.

victoryStar.name: Victory Star
victoryStar.description: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself by 10%.

turboblaze.name: Turboblaze
turboblaze.description: The Pokémon’s moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

teravolt.name: Teravolt
teravolt.description: The Pokémon’s moves are unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

aromaVeil.name: Aroma Veil
aromaVeil.description: Protects the Pokémon and its allies from effects that prevent the use of moves.

flowerVeil.name: Flower Veil
flowerVeil.description: If the Pokémon or its allies are Grass-type Pokémon, they are protected from status conditions and the lowering of their stats.

cheekPouch.name: Cheek Pouch
cheekPouch.description: The Pokémon’s HP is restored when it eats any Berry by 33% of its maximum HP, in addition to the Berry’s usual effect.

protean.name: Protean
protean.description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use.

furCoat.name: Fur Coat
furCoat.description: Halves the damage taken from physical moves.

magician.name: Magician
magician.description: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
bulletproof.description: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

competitive.name: Competitive
competitive.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat sharply when its stats are lowered by an opposing Pokémon.

strongJaw.name: Strong Jaw
strongJaw.description: The Pokémon’s strong jaw boosts the power of its biting moves by 50%.

refrigerate.name: Refrigerate
refrigerate.description: Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted by 20%.

sweetVeil.name: Sweet Veil
sweetVeil.description: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from falling asleep.

stanceChange.name: Stance Change
stanceChange.description: The Pokémon changes its form to Blade Forme when it uses an attack move and changes to Shield Forme when it uses King’s Shield.

galeWings.name: Gale Wings
galeWings.description: Gives priority to the Pokémon’s Flying-type moves while its HP is full.

megaLauncher.name: Mega Launcher
megaLauncher.description: Boosts the power of aura and pulse moves by 50%. Heal Pulse heals 25% more.

grassPelt.name: Grass Pelt
grassPelt.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat by 50% while on Grassy Terrain.

symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
symbiosis.description: The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.

toughClaws.name: Tough Claws
toughClaws.description: Powers up moves that make direct contact by 30%.

pixilate.name: Pixilate
pixilate.description: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted by 20%.

gooey.name: Gooey
gooey.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

aerilate.name: Aerilate
aerilate.description: Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted by 20%.

parentalBond.name: Parental Bond
parentalBond.description: The Pokémon strikes twice, with the second strike dealing 25% of its usual damage. The ability does not affect multistrike moves, or spread moves when attacking more than one Pokémon.

darkAura.name: Dark Aura
darkAura.description: Powers up the Dark-type moves of all Pokémon on the field by 33%

fairyAura.name: Fairy Aura
fairyAura.description: Powers up the Fairy-type moves of all Pokémon on the field by 33%.

auraBreak.name: Aura Break
auraBreak.description: The effects of Fairy Aura and Dark Aura are reversed and nullified, causing affected moves to be 25% weaker.

primordialSea.name: Primordial Sea
primordialSea.description: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Fire-type attacks.

desolateLand.name: Desolate Land
desolateLand.description: The Pokémon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.

deltaStream.name: Delta Stream
deltaStream.description: The Pokémon changes the weather so that no moves are supereffective against the Flying type.

stamina.name: Stamina
stamina.description: Boosts the Defense stat when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

wimpOut.name: Wimp Out
wimpOut.description: The Pokémon cowardly switches out when its HP drops to half or less.

emergencyExit.name: Emergency Exit
emergencyExit.description: The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP drops to half or less.

waterCompaction.name: Water Compaction
waterCompaction.description: Boosts the Defense stat sharply when the Pokémon is hit by a Water-type move.

merciless.name: Merciless
merciless.description: The Pokémon’s attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

shieldsDown.name: Shields Down
shieldsDown.description: When its HP drops to half or less, the Pokémon’s shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

stakeout.name: Stakeout
stakeout.description: Doubles the damage dealt to a target that has just switched into battle.

waterBubble.name: Water Bubble
waterBubble.description: Doubles the power of the Pokémon’s Water-type moves while halving the power of Fire-type moves done to the Pokémon. This also prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat when it takes a hit that causes its HP to drop to half or less.

slushRush.name: Slush Rush
slushRush.description: Doubles the Pokémon’s Speed stat in snow or hail. Pokémon with this ability also receive no damage from hail.

longReach.name: Long Reach
longReach.description: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

triage.name: Triage
triage.description: Gives priority to the Pokémon’s healing moves.

galvanize.name: Galvanize
galvanize.description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted by 20%.

surgeSurfer.name: Surge Surfer
surgeSurfer.description: Doubles the Pokémon’s Speed stat while on Electric Terrain.

schooling.name: Schooling
schooling.description: When the Pokémon is Level 20 or higher and is above 25% HP, the Pokémon forms a powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP is equal to 25% or below.

disguise.name: Disguise
disguise.description: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack at the cost of losing 1/8 of its maximum HP.

battleBond.name: Battle Bond
battleBond.description: Defeating an opposing Pokémon strengthens the Pokémon’s bond with its Trainer. This causes it to transform and boosts Water Shuriken’s power to 20, while always landing three hits.

powerConstruct.name: Power Construct
powerConstruct.description: Cells gather to aid the Pokémon when its HP drops to half or less, causing it to change into its Complete Forme.

corrosion.name: Corrosion
corrosion.description: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel- or Poison-type.

comatose.name: Comatose
comatose.description: The Pokémon is always drowsing and can attack while in its sleeping state. It is considered under the effects of a status condition.

queenlyMajesty.name: Queenly Majesty
queenlyMajesty.description: The Pokémon’s majesty pressures opponents and makes them unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

innardsOut.name: Innards Out
innardsOut.description: When the Pokémon is knocked out, it damages its attacker by the amount equal to the HP it had left before it was hit.

dancer.name: Dancer
dancer.description: Whenever a dance move is used in battle, the Pokémon will copy the user to immediately perform that dance move itself.

battery.name: Battery
battery.description: Powers up ally Pokémon’s special moves by 30%.

fluffy.name: Fluffy
fluffy.description: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

dazzling.name: Dazzling
dazzling.description: The Pokémon dazzles its opponents, making them unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

soulHeart.name: Soul-Heart
soulHeart.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat every time another Pokémon faints.

tanglingHair.name: Tangling Hair
tanglingHair.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

receiver.name: Receiver
receiver.description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

powerOfAlchemy.name: Power of Alchemy
powerOfAlchemy.description: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

beastBoost.name: Beast Boost
beastBoost.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s most proficient stat every time it knocks out a target.

rksSystem.name: RKS System
rksSystem.description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to match the memory disc it holds.

electricSurge.name: Electric Surge
electricSurge.description: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

psychicSurge.name: Psychic Surge
psychicSurge.description: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

mistySurge.name: Misty Surge
mistySurge.description: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

grassySurge.name: Grassy Surge
grassySurge.description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

fullMetalBody.name: Full Metal Body
fullMetalBody.description: Prevents other Pokémon’s moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon’s stats.

shadowShield.name: Shadow Shield
shadowShield.description: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full by half. This cannot be ignored by other moves or Abilities.

prismArmor.name: Prism Armor
prismArmor.description: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken by 25%.

neuroforce.name: Neuroforce
neuroforce.description: Powers up moves that are super effective by 25%.

intrepidSword.name: Intrepid Sword
intrepidSword.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.

dauntlessShield.name: Dauntless Shield
dauntlessShield.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Defense stat when the Pokémon enters a battle.

libero.name: Libero
libero.description: Changes the Pokémon’s type to the type of the move it’s about to use.

ballFetch.name: Ball Fetch
ballFetch.description: The Pokémon will fetch the Poké Ball from the first failed throw of the battle.

cottonDown.name: Cotton Down
cottonDown.description: When the Pokémon is hit by an attack, it scatters cotton fluff around and lowers the Speed stat of all Pokémon except itself.

propellerTail.name: Propeller Tail
propellerTail.description: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

mirrorArmor.name: Mirror Armor
mirrorArmor.description: Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.

gulpMissile.name: Gulp Missile
gulpMissile.description: When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it will come back in either Gulping Form or Gouging Form depending on its remaining HP. Taking damage will cause it to spit out and return to base form, attacking for 1/4 of the attacker’s HP while also lowering their defense or inflicting paralysis.

stalwart.name: Stalwart
stalwart.description: Ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s Abilities and moves that draw in moves.

steamEngine.name: Steam Engine
steamEngine.description: Maxes the Pokémon’s Speed stat if hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.

punkRock.name: Punk Rock
punkRock.description: Boosts the power of sound-based moves. The Pokémon also takes half the damage from these kinds of moves.

sandSpit.name: Sand Spit
sandSpit.description: The Pokémon creates a sandstorm when it’s hit by an attack.

iceScales.name: Ice Scales
iceScales.description: The Pokémon is protected by ice scales, which halve the damage taken from special moves.

ripen.name: Ripen
ripen.description: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

iceFace.name: Ice Face
iceFace.description: The Pokémon’s ice head can take a physical attack as a substitute, but the attack also changes the Pokémon’s appearance. The ice will be restored when it snows or hails.

powerSpot.name: Power Spot
powerSpot.description: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up ally Pokémon’s moves by 30%.

mimicry.name: Mimicry
mimicry.description: Changes the Pokémon’s type depending on the terrain.

screenCleaner.name: Screen Cleaner
screenCleaner.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.

steelySpirit.name: Steely Spirit
steelySpirit.description: Powers up the Steel-type moves of the Pokémon and its allies by 50%.

perishBody.name: Perish Body
perishBody.description: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

wanderingSpirit.name: Wandering Spirit
wanderingSpirit.description: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

gorillaTactics.name: Gorilla Tactics
gorillaTactics.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat by 50%, but only allows the use of the first selected move.

neutralizingGas.name: Neutralizing Gas
neutralizingGas.description: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

pastelVeil.name: Pastel Veil
pastelVeil.description: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from being poisoned.

hungerSwitch.name: Hunger Switch
hungerSwitch.description: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of each turn. This also changes Aura Wheel to be either an Electric- or Dark-type move.

quickDraw.name: Quick Draw
quickDraw.description: The Pokémon has a 30% chance to move first in its priority bracket.

unseenFist.name: Unseen Fist
unseenFist.description: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

curiousMedicine.name: Curious Medicine
curiousMedicine.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

chillingNeigh.name: Chilling Neigh
chillingNeigh.description: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

grimNeigh.name: Grim Neigh
grimNeigh.description: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

asOneGlastrier.name: As One
asOneGlastrier.description: This Ability combines the effects of both Unnerve and Chilling Neigh, preventing opposing Pokémon from consuming berries and boosting its Attack stat when knocking out a target.

asOneSpectrier.name: As One
asOneSpectrier.description: This Ability combines the effects of both Unnerve and Grim Neigh, preventing opposing Pokémon from consuming berries and boosting its Sp. Atk stat when knocking out a target.

lingeringAroma.name: Lingering Aroma
lingeringAroma.description: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Lingering Aroma.

seedSower.name: Seed Sower
seedSower.description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

thermalExchange.name: Thermal Exchange
thermalExchange.description: Boosts the Attack stat when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.

angerShell.name: Anger Shell
angerShell.description: When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

purifyingSalt.name: Purifying Salt
purifyingSalt.description: The Pokémon’s pure salt protects it from status conditions and halves the damage taken from Ghost-type moves.

wellBakedBody.name: Well-Baked Body
wellBakedBody.description: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.

windRider.name: Wind Rider
windRider.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.

guardDog.name: Guard Dog
guardDog.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.

windPower.name: Wind Power
windPower.description: The Pokémon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move or when Tailwind takes affect, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

zeroToHero.name: Zero to Hero
zeroToHero.description: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.

commander.name: Commander
commander.description: Upon entering battle, this Pokémon goes inside an ally Dondozo if one is on the field; then issues commands from there. This Pokémon also raises the likelihood of double battles.

electromorphosis.name: Electromorphosis
electromorphosis.description: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

protosynthesis.name: Protosynthesis
protosynthesis.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s most proficient stat in harsh sunlight by 30%, 50% if the stat boosted is Speed.

quarkDrive.name: Quark Drive
quarkDrive.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s most proficient stat on Electric Terrain by 30%, 50% if the stat boosted is Speed.

goodAsGold.name: Good as Gold
goodAsGold.description: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon full immunity to other Pokémon’s status moves.

vesselOfRuin.name: Vessel of Ruin
vesselOfRuin.description: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself by 25%.

swordOfRuin.name: Sword of Ruin
swordOfRuin.description: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself by 25%.

tabletsOfRuin.name: Tablets of Ruin
tabletsOfRuin.description: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself by 25%.

beadsOfRuin.name: Beads of Ruin
beadsOfRuin.description: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself by 25%.

orichalcumPulse.name: Orichalcum Pulse
orichalcumPulse.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat by 33% in harsh sunlight.

hadronEngine.name: Hadron Engine
hadronEngine.description: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat by 33% on Electric Terrain.

opportunist.name: Opportunist
opportunist.description: If an opponent’s stat is boosted, the Pokémon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.

cudChew.name: Cud Chew
cudChew.description: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.

supremeOverlord.name: Supreme Overlord
supremeOverlord.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats receive a 10% boost for each of its allies that have already been defeated.

costar.name: Costar
costar.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally’s stat changes.

toxicDebris.name: Toxic Debris
toxicDebris.description: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

armorTail.name: Armor Tail
armorTail.description: The mysterious tail covering the Pokémon’s head makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

earthEater.name: Earth Eater
earthEater.description: If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has 1/4 of its maximum HP restored instead of taking damage.

myceliumMight.name: Mycelium Might
myceliumMight.description: The Pokémon will always move last within its priority bracket when using status moves, but these moves will be unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

mindsEye.name: Mind’s Eye
mindsEye.description: The Pokémon ignores changes to opponents’ evasiveness, its accuracy can’t be lowered, and it can hit Ghost types with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

supersweetSyrup.name: Supersweet Syrup
supersweetSyrup.description: A sickly sweet scent spreads across the field when the Pokémon enters a battle, lowering the evasiveness of opposing Pokémon.

hospitality.name: Hospitality
hospitality.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it showers its ally with hospitality, restoring 25% of the ally’s HP.

toxicChain.name: Toxic Chain
toxicChain.description: The power of the Pokémon’s toxic chain may badly poison any target the Pokémon hits with a move.

embodyAspectTeal.name: Embody Aspect
embodyAspectTeal.description: The Pokémon’s heart fills with memories, causing the Teal Mask to shine and the Pokémon’s Speed stat to be boosted.

embodyAspectWellspring.name: Embody Aspect
embodyAspectWellspring.description: The Pokémon’s heart fills with memories, causing the Wellspring Mask to shine and the Pokémon’s Sp. Def stat to be boosted.

embodyAspectHearthflame.name: Embody Aspect
embodyAspectHearthflame.description: The Pokémon’s heart fills with memories, causing the Hearthflame Mask to shine and the Pokémon’s Attack stat to be boosted.

embodyAspectCornerstone.name: Embody Aspect
embodyAspectCornerstone.description: The Pokémon’s heart fills with memories, causing the Cornerstone Mask to shine and the Pokémon’s Defense stat to be boosted.

teraShift.name: Tera Shift
teraShift.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it absorbs the energy around itself and transforms into its Terastal Form.

teraShell.name: Tera Shell
teraShell.description: The Pokémon’s shell contains the powers of each type. All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokémon when its HP is full will not be very effective.

teraformZero.name: Teraform Zero
teraformZero.description: The Pokémon uses its hidden powers to eliminate all effects of weather and terrain, reducing them to zero.

poisonPuppeteer.name: Poison Puppeteer
poisonPuppeteer.description: Pokémon poisoned by this Pokémon’s moves will also become confused.
